title: i hate it when..
body: people ask to report for int feeding when it wasnt.  last game bot and mid got crushed early, which snowballed into darius top not doing good.  he ended the game 1/7 at 30 min.  his entire team says to report him for inting, when he never did anything remotely close to that.  always fought to win and tried to escape when he couldnt.  so i reported his whole team for salt.
